title: Senior Business Analyst /Project Manager (Luxembourg)
description:
Drive Efficiency and Growth at Fujitsu




Fujitsu is a leading ICT company 125.000 employees worldwide, more than 140 in Luxembourg, offering a full range of technology, solutions and services. This is an opportunity to join a strong organization within a young, dynamic and flexible work environment, with a real growth opportunities and immediately make an impact.







YOUR MISSION :




As part of the development of custom-built systems, we are looking for an experienced Functional Consultant to support the following activities:

 * Assist project stakeholders as a Business Analyst and Project Manager.
 * Perform functional analysis and business process modeling.
 * Draft detailed functional specifications based on business needs.
 * Supporting business stakeholders in solution definition and implementation.
 * Applying testing methodologies in custom-built environments
 * Implement and execute test methodologies within tailor-made development contexts.







YOUR PROFILE :




 * Bachelor’s degree (Bac+4 minimum) in IT, Computer Science, or a related discipline.
 * Expérience as a Functional Analyst, Business Analyst (AMOA) or Project Manager.
 * Some experience in test execution
 * Strong communication and documentation abilities.
 * Fluency in French is mandatory; proficiency in English is a plus
 * Familiarity with one or more of the following: PRINCE2, PMBOK, Quapital IT.







WHY FUJITSU ?




Innovation at the Service of Sustainable Transformation







Fujitsu is one of the world's leading information and communication technology (ICT) companies, specializing in IT solutions, digital transformation services, artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, and cloud computing.







Fujitsu supports businesses in their innovation and performance through its 130,000 employees, who assist clients in over 100 countries. We leverage our expertise and the power of ICT to shape a more sustainable future in collaboration with our customers.







In Luxembourg, Fujitsu is a key player in digital transformation. With a disruptive approach, Fujitsu Luxembourg supports businesses in their digital journey, contributing to a more sustainable world and a society built on trust through innovation.







Join Fujitsu and be part of tomorrow’s digital transformation! Discover our opportunities and become part of a team that shapes the future with passion and expertise.
